foreignData.name: Gedächtnisreise
foreignData.text:
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl mischt bis zu drei Karten deiner Wahl aus seinem Friedhof in seine Bibliothek.
Rückblende {G} (Du kannst diese Karte aus deinem Friedhof für ihre Rückblendekosten wirken. Schicke sie danach ins Exil.)

foreignData.name: Viaje del recuerdo
foreignData.text:
El jugador objetivo baraja hasta tres cartas objetivo de su cementerio en su biblioteca.
Retrospectiva {G}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta desde tu cementerio pagando su coste de retrospectiva. Luego exíliala.)

foreignData.name: Voyage de la mémoire
foreignData.text:
Le joueur ciblé mélange jusqu'à trois cartes ciblées de son cimetière dans sa bibliothèque.
Flashback {G} (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte depuis votre cimetière pour son coût de flashback. Puis exilez-la.)

foreignData.name: Viaggio del Ricordo
foreignData.text:
Un giocatore bersaglio rimescola nel suo grimorio fino a tre carte bersaglio dal suo cimitero.
Flashback {G} (Puoi lanciare questa carta dal tuo cimitero pagando il suo costo di flashback. Poi esiliala.)

foreignData.name: 記憶の旅
foreignData.text:
プレイヤー１人と、そのプレイヤーの墓地にあるカードを最大３枚まで対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、それらのカードを自分のライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
フラッシュバック {G} （あなたはフラッシュバック・コストで、このカードをあなたの墓地から唱えてもよい。その後、それを追放する。）

foreignData.name: 기억의 여정
foreignData.text: 플레이어 한 명과 그 플레이어의 무덤에 있는 최대 세 장까지의 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 그 카드들을 자신의 서고에 섞어 넣는다.회상 (당신은 이 카드의 회상 비용을 지불해 이 카드를 무덤에서 발동할 수 있다. 그 후, 이 카드를 추방한다.)

foreignData.name: Jornada da Memória
foreignData.text:
O jogador alvo embaralha até três cards alvo do cemitério dele no próprio grimório.
Recapitular {G} (Você pode conjurar este card de seu cemitério pagando seu custo de recapitular. Depois, exile-o.)

foreignData.name: Путь Воспоминаний
foreignData.text:
Целевой игрок втасовывает не более трех целевых карт из своего кладбища в свою библиотеку.
Воспоминание {G} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту из вашего кладбища за ее стоимость Воспоминания. Затем изгоните ее.)

foreignData.name: 记忆之旅
foreignData.text:
目标牌手将至多三张目标牌从他的坟墓场洗入其牌库。
返照{G} （你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

foreignData.name: 記憶之旅
foreignData.text:
目標玩家將至多三張目標牌從他的墳墓場洗入其牌庫。
返照{G} （你可以從你的墳墓場施放此牌，並支付其返照費用，然後將它放逐。）

name: Memory's Journey
originalText:
Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

rulings.text: You don’t have to target any cards when you cast Memory’s Journey, but you must target a player.

If the player is an illegal target by the time Memory’s Journey resolves, the spell will have no effect, even if the cards are still legal targets. This is because a spell can’t make an illegal target (the player) perform any actions (such as shuffling their library).
Any of the targeted cards that are illegal targets by the time Memory’s Journey resolves aren’t shuffled into their owner’s library.
If no cards were targeted by Memory’s Journey or if all the targeted cards are illegal targets by the time Memory’s Journey resolves, the targeted player will still shuffle their library.
If you cast Memory’s Journey with flashback, it won’t be in the graveyard when you choose targets. It can’t target itself.

text:
Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
